mapper.select:
SELECT A.PT_OD_ID , A.SUB_PT_OD_ID , A.DEMAND_ID , A.LG_PART_NO , A.LG_OD_QTY , A.PROD_TYPE , A.NEO_LINE , A.NEO_PLAN_KEY , LEFT(A.SEND_TIME,10) AS SEND_TIME , A.SENDING_PC_NAME , A.GO_WITH , A.RE_PRINT , A.SUB_PART_NO , A.SUB_PART_DESC , A.VENDOR , A.BOM_QTY , A.SUB_UNIT , A.SUB_SUM_QTY , A.DEMAND_FLOOR , A.OSP FROM RFID_IF_SUBPART_SENDLIST_ALL A WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER A.PT_OD_ID ASC
ORDER BY A.PT_OD_ID DESC
ORDER BY A.SUB_PT_OD_ID DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_IF_SUBPART_SENDLIST_ALL A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT A.PT_OD_ID , A.SUB_PT_OD_ID , A.DEMAND_ID , A.LG_PART_NO , A.LG_OD_QTY , A.PROD_TYPE , A.NEO_LINE , A.NEO_PLAN_KEY , LEFT(A.SEND_TIME,10) AS SEND_TIME , A.SENDING_PC_NAME , A.GO_WITH , A.RE_PRINT , A.SUB_PART_NO , A.SUB_PART_DESC , A.VENDOR , A.BOM_QTY , A.SUB_UNIT , A.SUB_SUM_QTY , A.DEMAND_FLOOR , A.OSP FROM RFID_IF_SUBPART_SENDLIST_ALL A WHERE A.GO_WITH LIKE concat('%',#{goWith},'%') ORDER BY A.PT_OD_ID, A.SUB_PART_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RFID_IF_SUBPART_SENDLIST_ALL A WHERE A.GO_WITH LIKE concat('%',#{goWith},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_M_OUT ( M_OUT_ID , COUNT , MOVEMENTTYPE , DATEORDERED , DATEMOVEMENT , ISINVOICED , ISPRINTED , M_OUT_ORDEREOUT_ID , M_MOVEMENT_ID , C_SALES_ORDER_ID , DESCRIPTION , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{ptOdId} , #{subPtOdId} , 'V+' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , 'Y' , 'Y' , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , 'Y' ,DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'SYSTEM' ,DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'SYSTEM' )

SELECT get_seq('mOutline')
INSERT IGNORE INTO RFID_M_OUTLINE ( M_OUTLINE_ID , M_OUT_ID , M_PRODUCT_ID , QTYMOVEMENT , QTYINVOICED , C_UOM_ID , ISINVOICED , M_WAREHOUSE_ID , M_OUT_ORDERELINE_ID , C_SALES_ORDERLINE_ID , DESCRIPTION , M_MOVEMENTLINE_ID , REFERENCELINE_ID , USE_YN , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{mOutLineId} , #{ptOdId} , #{subPtOdId} , #{preQtyOnHand} , #{qtyinvoiced} , NULL , 'Y' , 1 , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , 'Y' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'SYSTEM' , DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ,'SYSTEM' )
